reviewText: The series has aged a bit.  And the endings by taking another car ride get boring and leave you wondering what really happened.

Go here (to the DVD versions) to see my full reviews of these great episodes: Avengers '67 - Set 1, Vols. 1 & 2 Avengers '67 - Set 2, Vols. 3 & 4 Avengers '67 - Set 3, Vols. 5 & 6 The Avengers '67 - Set 4, Vols. 7 & 8 Forget the VHS tapes -- buy the DVDs! They are MUCH clearer and sharper.
